description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.3M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Leighton Contracting. The average
  contract duration was 0.73 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $394.9K. The longest
  contract was 3.1 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.7M.
lookup_name: 'LEIGHTON CONTRACTING'

s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '4'

s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '13%'

s424_mean_duration: '0.73'
s421_mean_contract_value: '394.9K'
s425_max_duration: '3.1'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.7M'
